Information published on www.commoditypricecoin.com

  • This website provides general information on commodity price coin and does not provide advice of any kind.  Users must make their own assessment of the information published on this website and should take their own advice before engaging in any Commodity Price Coin transactions or activities.
  • Crycom does not provide any warranties regarding any content or data published on the website.
  • This website may from time to time contain content provided by third parties and links to third party sites.  Crycom will not be responsible for any content published on this website by a third party or any site to which this website contains links.

Risks related to the use of Commodity Price Coin

Commodity Price Coin is a new digital currency and payment system and its value may increase or decrease over a short period of time. The market for Commodity Price Coin is new and may sometimes be illiquid, meaning you may not always be able to sell or exchange your Commodity Price Coins. Due to the novel and volatile nature of digital investments, investors may lose some or all of their investment and should therefore consider all information and take advice before investing.

The Commodity Price Coin market operates using specialised software and hardware and relies on third party providers. The following events may result in a loss of Commodity Price Coins:

  • Mistakes by a user when using Commodity Price Coin - related software or services e.g. forgotten passwords, payments sent to wrong Commodity Price Coin addresses, and accidental deletion of wallets.
  • Software problems e.g. corrupted wallet file, incorrectly constructed transactions, unsafe cryptographic libraries, malware affecting the website and/or any Commodity Price Coin - related software or service.
  • Technical failures in a user’s hardware e.g. unauthorised access to users’ wallets and/or accounts.
  • Actions or inactions by a third party and/or events experienced by a third party e.g. bankruptcy of service providers, information security attacks on service providers and fraud by third parties.

Crycom will not be responsible for any loss, damages or claims arising from any events relating to Commodity Price Coin. The information published on this website does not provide any guarantees in relation to Commodity Price Coin or the investment in Commodity Price Coins.

Compliance with tax obligations

Commodity Price Coin transactions may be taxable and the tax treatment of Commodity Price Coins may vary depending on what jurisdiction you are in. Users are responsible for determining what, if any, taxes apply to their Commodity Price Coin transactions. Crycom is not responsible for determining the taxes that apply to Commodity Price Coin transactions.

Commodity Price Coins are not stored or traded on website

The website does not store, send or receive Commodity Price Coins. Commodity Price Coins exist only by virtue of a public ledger maintained in the Commodity Price Coin network. The website does not facilitate the transfer of title of any Commodity Price Coins as this occurs within a decentralised Commodity Price Coin network.

Limitation of liability

Unless otherwise required by law, in no event shall Crycom be liable for any loss, claim, costs or damages of any kind, including but not limited to, loss of use, loss of profits, or loss of data arising out of or in connection with the use of the website.

Governing law

The use of this website is governed by New Zealand law. As a user of the website you agree that the New Zealand courts have jurisdiction to hear and determine any disputes arising in relation to this website and for those purposes irrevocably submit to the jurisdiction of the New Zealand courts.

Some jurisdictions may impose limitations on the use of cryptocurrencies including Commodity Price Coin. Users in such jurisdictions should consider this and seek advice before using Commodity Price Coin. Users are responsible for ensuring the legality of any actions they take in relation to Commodity Price Coin.
